main.name: Paulo Victor Correia
main.occupation: I'm a computer engineering masters' degree student
main.description: I work as a Data Scientist on the Scientific Data Analysis Lab from the Computer Engineering Department in Federal University of Rio Grande do Norte, and have been working with Educational Data Mining, Time Series Analysis and Compression and Chat-Bots with rasa framework.
main.bio: My name is Paulo, I'm a masters degree student on eletrical and computer engineering and working with data science research. I am specialized on python for machine learning, researching time series analysis currently and also building chat bots for an industrial environment. I have worked in the past with digital signal processing and web development, with skills on using ReactJS and NodeJS for web and Microprocessors for signal analysis.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me at anytime!

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
